Body:
Description: Hi,

I would like to arrange a call with your technical support to discuss two risks identified by our latest Pingcastle vulnerability report:

'Number of Admins in Protected Groups'

'LDAP authentication without signature enforcement was allowed'

I would like to understand how we would go ahead and proceed with the remediation in our environment and also to understand the risk impact of such changes.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Shaheryar Ali Tahir, Rejaul Uddin, atif rashid, Joe Dibley
